# jest/valid-title

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Checks that the title of Jest blocks are valid by ensuring that titles are:

- not empty,
- is a string,
- not prefixed with their block name,
- have no leading or trailing spaces

### Example

```javascript
describe("", () => {});
describe("foo", () => {
  it("", () => {});
});
it("", () => {});
test("", () => {});
xdescribe("", () => {});
xit("", () => {});
xtest("", () => {});
```
